data.name: Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp 2020 - Trivandrum, Kerala
data.description: We are excited to kick off the Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp. This year’s bootcamps will incorporate the technologies and products that are now included in the Microsoft 365 platform. relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day India
relatedRecords.description: AWS Community Day India 2020 is being organized by AWS User Group India. We’re united by community-led learnings and diversified by the wide variety of tools and technologies closely knit with Amazon Web Services.
